name: The Game: The Game: The Game
name_original: The Game: The Game: The Game
description: “The Game: The Game: The Game” is a text-based interactive narrative game which walks users through the history, practices and terminology of the male seduction community featured in “The Game: The Game”.  This is an analytical companion piece to The Game: The Game which connects the notorious pick-up artists and tactics displayed in that game to its real-life source material and connected research. It was originally published in conjunction with a piece of investigative journalism for The Nation and commissioned by the Eyebeam Center for the Future of Journalism.
